Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveplain" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric. Made to measure hive plain concrete perfect fit pleated blind px71009.

products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout Calico Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Sakura Primrose Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of oursakura patterned range, with a simple floral design which will bring warmth to any room. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through.

products.description: With their slick, polished look and dark intensity, this blind will add a dramatic vibe to your home in an instant. The black slats are pure and plain, satin-finished and stylish, perfect for a modern look based on clean lines and crisp colours. The perfect fit system provides you with their slick, polished look and dark intensity, this blind will add a dramatic vibe to your home in an instant.

products.title: Pearl Graphite Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This pearl graphite perfect fit blind is about as modern and stylish as it gets. The classy grey colourway and stunning finish is more like something you'd find on a luxury car than a blind. Still, it works beautifully and is finished off with a perfect fit frame that sits seamless this pearl graphite perfect fit blind is about as modern and stylish as it gets.

products.title: Neutral Grey Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Gently coloured with a hint of grey this gloss venetian blind is endlessly versatile toning with any number of colour schemes. We can definitely see this in a conservatory with scrubbed woods or shabby chic touches.

products.title: Antique White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Off white with a hint of cream, this matt perfect fit antique white venetian blind brings a little warmth along with brightness. If white will just be too bright and cool then the antique white slat colour may well be perfect in more ways than one.

products.title: Perfect Fit Black
products.description: As becoming as a little black dress, this matt black venetian blind will clothe your conservatory with a sophisticated air, and maybe just a touch of drama and excitement too.

products.title: Pearl Graphite Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: This dark brown slat has a little touch of pewter too, a great coloured slat that will be just as happy in a decor of brown or grey. The finish is pearlescent with a subtle sparkle.

products.title: Antique White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: For a look thats sleek, bright and bursting with style, this blind really is the one. Pure white can be a little stark, so the creamy hint here is welcome and adds a little warmth. Tilt the slats using a sleek wand to control the light however you please. An integral frame slots for a look thats sleek, bright and bursting with style, this blind really is the one.

products.title: Duolight Mushroom  Perfect Fit Thermal Blind
products.description: If you're looking for a cosy, natural colour, these perfect fit duolight mushroom pleated blinds are an excellent place to start. The soft brown shade gives your home a colour thats more charming than beige and just like a snuggly blanket. You get the snuggly feeling even more wi if you're looking for a cosy, natural colour, these perfect fit duolight mushroom pleated blinds are an excellent place to start.

products.title: Mayfair Taupe Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required mayfair taupe dimout perfect fit.

products.title: Mayfair Ash Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: For a grey with a darker hue, the moody mid-dark tone of the mayfair ash dimout makes it an excellent choice. The smooth single-tone fabric enjoys natural shading courtesy of the pleated ripples that run the length of the blind, creating natural highlights and deepening shadows throughout. The innovative perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes from your window without leaving a trace.

products.title: Mayfair Noir Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Bewitch all who befall your mayfair noir dimout blinds, as their dark glamour creates the ultimate dramatic statement piece. The matt black fabric benefits from extra light and depth created from the shadows of the polyester blind's pleating, giving it a beautifully tactile look. Despite its dark tone, the noir blind is created with dimout fabric to allow light to gently filter through in the daytime, to create a gentle light glow even when the blind is closed for full privacy.

products.title: Mayfair Grey Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Update your windows with the exquisite mayfair grey dimout perfect fit, for a charming look to your windows. The smooth grey tone is dappled only by the light and shadow of the blind's ripping pleats, to give an ultra-textured look that would go beautifully with other tactile grey fabrics within your interior. The frame is designed to be a perfect colour match for white and anthracite upvc windows, so the installed blind will look like a seamless part of your windows.

products.title: Mayfair Mint Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Get the freshness of a crisp white with the eye-catching charm of a pastel with the mayfair mint dimout pleated perfect fit. This delightful pleated fabric has a gentle checkering effect when viewed up close, that smoothes out from a distance into a creamy mint. The dimout style allows for some light to pass through even when the blind is closed, to enable some light alongside privacy, ideal for daytime rooms such as receptions and conservatories.

products.title: Mayfair Cream Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: The mayfair cream dimout perfect fit offers unbridled elegance in an easy-fit form. Rather than installing onto the wall, the blind clips to your actual window frame, for a flush fit that integrates seamlessly into your window. When closed the pleated style means the honeycomb fabric cascades down the glass, as well as offering thermal benefits to help regulate temperature. A milky cream tone creates a delicate neutral, which would pair well with more traditional interiors and antique furnishings.

products.title: Mayfair Ivory Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: Experience premium shading in its simplest possible form with the mayfair ivory dimout perfect fit. This blind clips onto your actual window frame, the brackets sliding in to lock onto your window without need of drilling or tools. The pleated style creates an attractive texture in your window frame, rippling down the glass when closed, and additionally provides thermal benefits to help regulate temperature.

products.title: Vassal Mist Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: For something a little different, vassal mist twins a vintage and nautical feel, to create a muted grey blind with the gentlest touch of green. The colour is created with tiny dense checks that can only be seen up close, for flawless continual colouration when standing back. The dimout style allows for some light to pass through even when the blind is closed, to enable some light alongside privacy, ideal for daytime rooms such as receptions and conservatories.

products.title: Vassal Frost Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Vassal frost is a crisp white with a delicate tint, for a clean and bright blind that has a calmness and purity about it. Matching beautifully with its white upvc frame, the innovative perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free, fuss-free fit. The dimout style allows a gentle scatter of light to filter through even when the blind is closed, to enable both light and privacy together, making this an ideal choice for 'daytime' rooms such sunrooms and living rooms.

products.title: Vassal Gold Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Paper your windows in gold for a touch of midas luxe. The vassal gold pleated perfect fit is a stunning gold-tone fabric made up of delicate checkers, that fold in pleats to add interest down the fabric. This gentle texture is enhanced by the dimout style, which allows for gentle light filtering during the daytime, to bathe the whole room in a sun-enhancing golden glow. Like all blinds in the perfect fit system, the shade clips in direct to your window for a tools-free, fuss-free fitting.

products.title: Soho Brown Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Enjoy a classic tone in your window with the soho brown pleated dimout perfect fit. The rich brown of this blind is an ideal match for retro furnishings made from dark wood, such as mahogany and walnut. The fabric itself is not a dull one-tone, but is instead built up from overlapping multi-tonal strokes to create a lively and vivid colour. The dimout style means some light filters through in the daytime, further enlivening this exciting blind.

products.title: Soho Slate Pleated Perfect Fit

products.title: Cellular Warm White Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: For a darker grey in your window the hampton grey pleated is a superb option. The colour is not created in a block but rather created from a series of short strokes of mid-tone and darker greys, which layer into a deep grey fabric. Additional shading comes from the pleated ripples that create natural highlights and pooling shadows. The perfect fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free installation in under 15 minutes.

products.title: Hampton Dove Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Grey is the new white in the world of interiors, and this hampton dove is a particularly on-trend shade. Instead of a block colour, the polyester blind is made up of short strokes of lighter and darker greys, for a lively and organic effect. These horizontal strokes marry well with the pleated ripples that run throughout the fabric, the concertina effect creating its own natural highlights and pooling shadows.

products.title: Kingston Cream Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Create elegant shading in your window with the kingston cream pleated perfect fit. The game-changing blind style fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for a simple tools-free installation system. Colour match your perfect fit frame to your upvc window for an integrated, cohesive look. The cream hue has a classic elegance that's well suited to traditional interiors.

products.title: Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Create a stunning statement piece out of your windows with kingston royal blue perfect fit. The richness of the colour makes this a balancing force in rooms with strongly coloured furnishings, while the dimout fabric still allows some lightflow during the daytime, for a gentle softening effect. The perfect fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, making it a great choice for conservatories which often have little wall space.

products.title: Kingston Flint Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: The kingston fabrics have a pebble-dash effect to them that creates an organic fabric that matches gorgeously with other organic materials and furnishings. Kingston flint's stone-grey tone is a dappling texture in a dimout style, allowing gentle light levels to pass through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly.

products.title: Kingston Black Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Like all the kingston blinds, kingston black pleated perfect fit benefits from a pebble-dash effect across the fabric body that creates an organic texture. The dark black fabric is softened by this dappling texture, while the dimout style further enhances this effect by allowing gentle light levels to flow through when the blind is closed, to allow for privacy without darkness. The smart perfect fit system clips in flush against the window for a tools-free fit that installs quickly and removes tracelessly.

products.title: Kingston Coco Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Discover the joys of a rich brown blind with the kingston coco pleated perfect fit. As with all perfect fits, the blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall above, for simple tools-free installation. The chocolatey coco colouration is a must for rooms with plenty of dark wood, or homemakers looking for an 'unusual' neutral that breaks away from the classic monochromes.

products.title: Kingston Peach Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Create soft warmth in your window with the kingston peach pleated perfect fit. This innovative blind style clips to the window frame itself rather than installing on the wall above, making it a quick and simple fit. Once in place the blind looks like an integrated part of your window, for a cohesive look. The peach hue is a little more informal than the more 'classic' neutrals, for relaxed interiors.
